Introduction
This topic contains information on the exchange of records between VA, DARBA, and ADRB, including
memorandum of understanding (MOU) between VA, DARBA, and ADRB
, and
procedures for obtaining records from DARBA or ADRB
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G - Record Exchanges Between the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and the Service Departments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G
